title: Add Negative Keywords to Campaign
description: An SEM manager reviews a search query report and finds irrelevant searches triggering ads. They need to add negative keywords to prevent this.

tasks.description: Pull the search query report for a specific campaign for the last 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the list of actual search terms that triggered ads.
Agent compiles a list of terms that indicate non-commercial intent.

tasks.description: Add the identified irrelevant terms to the campaign's negative keyword list.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the negative keyword list, improving campaign efficiency.
